thread.title: Very happy, great hotel
thread.title_full: Very happy, great hotel - Review of London House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: elizabeth20172017
title: Very happy, great hotel
text:
Located in a nice quiet area just off a main street, near all local transport. I was in a basement room, although this was perfectly fine and very spacious although I was on my own. The rooms where beautifully presented and very clean.
The reception staff of the evening I arrived where very helpful ans professional, the morning, not so great service however it did not ruin my experience.
